p: The second part of whole-lung homogenates were used to prepare single-cell suspensions were using treatment with collagenase IV (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Quentin Fallavier, France) and ACK (Ammonium-Chloride-Potassium) Lysing Buffer (Fisher Scientific, Graffenstaden, France) as previously described [ 15, 20]. Analysis was then performed using a LSR Fortessa Flow Cytometer (BD Biosciences, San Jose, CA, USA) and the results analysed with FlowJo software (v10; Tree Star, Ashland OR, USA). The antibodies and the gating strategies used are depicted in the Additional file 1: Figure S1.
